name: SegmentedButton
desc: A Material button that allows the user to select from limited set of options.

fields.name: segments
fields.desc: Descriptions of the segments in the button.

fields.name: selected
fields.desc: The set of [ButtonSegment.value]s that indicate which [segments] are selected.

fields.name: onSelectionChanged
fields.desc: The function that is called when the selection changes.

fields.name: multiSelectionEnabled
fields.desc: Determines if multiple segments can be selected at one time.

fields.name: emptySelectionAllowed
fields.desc: Determines if having no selected segments is allowed.

fields.name: expandedInsets
fields.desc: Determines the segmented button's size and padding based on [expandedInsets].

fields.name: showSelectedIcon
fields.desc: Determines if the [selectedIcon] (usually an icon using [Icons.check]) is displayed on the selected segments.

fields.name: selectedIcon
fields.desc: An icon that is used to indicate a segment is selected.
